name: The Frizz Genius Anti Frizz Hair Goal Concentrate
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Hair Masks
about: What it is: A Hair Goal Concentrate for frizz-taming and humidity resistance, designed to be added to any Function of Beauty PRO haircare product to customize your formula. All hair types can benefit from The Frizz Genius, but Function of Beauty particularly recommends this Hair Goal Concentrate for curly and coily hair...Hair Texture: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily..Hair Type: Fine, Medium, and Thick..Hair Concerns:.- Color Safe.- Frizz..Key Benefits:.- Helps control frizz.- Supports humidity resistance..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Tamarind Extract: Supports frizz control...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: Add this Hair Goal Concentrate to your Function of Beauty PRO Shampoo or Conditioner Mask to fully customize your formula to help tame frizz, and support humidity resistance. Add up to three Hair Goal Concentrates per product to address a range of haircare concerns. Due to the concentration of natural ingredients the formulas may appear colored...Fragrance Description: Fragrance-Free.
ingredients: -Tamarind Extract: Supports frizz control...Tamarindus Indica Fruit Extract, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-With the spout facing up, push back the tab to snap open..-Pour entire contents into your Function of Beauty PRO product. .-Shake or stir for 15 seconds until fully mixed in..-Add up to three Hair Goal Concentrates per Function of Beauty PRO product... Recycling Instructions:.- 100% Recyclable Carton made of FSC Certified cardboard.

reviews.review_text: The Frizz Genius Anti Frizz Hair Goal Concentrate is an excellent product to combat frizz. Its long-term effectiveness makes it a must-have in my hair care routine. I would recommend it to anyone who struggles with frizz and wants to keep their hair soft and manageable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This frizz genius concentrate was a great addition to my bond repair leave in. The concentrate was very easy to add and made my wavy hair look like way less frizzy. Not sure how much of the effect is the concentrate and how much is the leave in but overall it worked great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Frizz Genius Anti-Frizz Hair Goal Concentrate is a powerful and effective serum designed to tame and control frizz, leaving  hair smooth, shiny, and manageable. Infused with nourishing ingredients such as argan oil, coconut oil, and shea butter, this concentrate works to hydrate and protect your hair from humidity and environmental stressors. Whether  have naturally curly, wavy, or straight hair, this lightweight formula will leave   locks looking and feeling their best. Say goodbye to frizz and hello to sleek, silky hair with the Frizz Genius Anti-Frizz Hair Goal Concentrate.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Introducing the Frizz Genius from Function of Beauty Pro: the Freeze Taming Hair Goal Concentrate. This oil boasts a uniquely watery texture, with a hint of oiliness. I discovered that it's best applied to damp hair. While the product lacks clear instructions regarding application on dry or damp hair, given its watery consistency, I opted for damp hair. Living in humid Florida, I found it effective in taming frizz temporarily. However, its scent is somewhat off-putting, and I wasn't particularly fond of its texture. While it's worth trying out, personally, I didn't notice significant improvements or benefits from using this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This actually makes hair wash time very pleasant. This is the third one of these little conditions Iu2019ve tried. Love it. Also makes a great little add on gift !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Anti Frizz Hair Goal Concentrate Mix-In is a game-changer! Just a few drops transform unruly locks into smooth, frizz-free perfection. It's lightweight, non-greasy, and adds shine without weighing hair down. Say goodbye to frizz and hello to your best hair days!

reviews.review_text: I used this concentrate on my hair mask for about 15 minutes and my hair smells amazing, My hair has never looked better since using Function of Beauty wavy hair shampoo and conditioner with the anti frizz, shine, and moisture add ins. I highly recommend this to anyone who has thin, fine hair and is susceptible to hair breakage. Great product!

I will probably keep the same hair goals for a little and then try some different ones for my wavy and frizzy heart but so far so good!

reviews.review_text: As someone with long wavy hair, frizzy hair is a concern more often than not and I have tried so many products to combat my frizz and this product really does that! I love that I can add this concentrate to different products and that it matches my concern.

reviews.review_text: Love how you can add these to your conditioner or shampoo, depending on your hair concerns. I have 3a 3b curls I have very dry curls. So adding this to my conditioner really boos the moisture. It makes my curls so shiny. Definitely gives my curls that craneo hydration they need. I definitely love all the wash  product. reviews.review_title: An Ok Product worth a shot!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the NEW Curly Hair Recovery Shampoo & Conditioner Mask from Function of Beauty, and it was... okay.  What I liked was the ability to customize the products to my specific hair needs. Choosing my hair goals and fragrance was a fun touch. The shampoo did a decent job of cleaning my hair without leaving it feeling too dry.  However, the conditioner mask didn't quite live up to my expectations. While it made my hair soft, I was hoping for more defined curls, and it didn't quite deliver on that front.  Another drawback for me was the price. It's on the expensive side for hair care, and I'm not sure if the level of personalization justifies the cost.  In summary, it's not a bad product, but it didn't wow me either. If you're looking for a personalized hair care experience and don't mind the price, it might be worth a try.  Gifted by functionofbeauty

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Function of Beauty: what a perfect addition to the Recovery Mask! It gave the mask a boost of hydration and anti frizz protection especially during the humid Chicago summers! I think I will definitely keep this in my haircare arsenal!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A major benefit of the concentrate is how light it is and how little oily residue it leaves behind. Because I only need a small quantity each time, the bottle is quite economical and well worth the cost. My hair is shinier and smoother than ever before, and the solution feels healthy.  This product's ability to be customized makes it unique. I appreciate that they consider things like hair type, texture, and even personal smell preferences.  complimentary from functionofbeauty

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tried this complimentary from function of beauty. I thought having add ins to be able to customize your own shampoo to your needs is a great idea.  Its super cute however I think this should be split into two one for shampoo one for conditioner.  Having it in one makes it easier to forget or make a mess.  Its a little hard to explain what the anti frizz did to my hair. Its still frizzy but its also smoother.     This did average. I suppose using a full in each night work better. As well as over time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I mixed this into my function of beauty shampoo and my hair felt great after washing it. It didnu2019t feel super frizzy and my curls dried down beautifully! My natural hair feels and looks a lot more healthier with this add-in!  *gifted by Function of Beauty PRO

reviews.review_text: I'm so excited to share my experience with Function of Beauty's Frizz Genius for curly hair. As a young girl with curly hair, I often struggle with frizz and undefined curls. However, with this miracle product, my hair looks defined, moisturized, and frizz-free. The formula feels lightweight and does not weigh down my curls, leaving them looking shiny and healthy. I am absolutely loving this product and would definitely recommend it to anyone with frizzy, curly hair. It has become an essential part of my hair routine and I can't imagine going back to using any other product! gifted by function of beauty PRO

reviews.review_text: Complimentary from Function of Beauty.  The Frizz Genius Anti Frizz Hair Goal Concentrate is so lovely and it works for my hair and keeps it silky smooth and thereu2019s no frizz what so ever.  This is fast becoming one of my favorite products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the idea of being able to fully customize your haircare products with specialized hair concentrates that are both affordable and effective! That's why I was sooo excited this was gifted by functionofbeauty, alongside the Function of Beauty Pro shampoo and conditioner base. I added half of The Frizz Genius Hair Goal Concentrate to both my shampoo and conditioner base, and it seems to have been enough of a dose for both based on my smooth and manageable curly hair results. This product has no scent and mixed into the shampoo and conditioner seamlessly. The packaging is so so cute as well, as the little container inside is an elegant f! As someone who has sensitive skin,  I can also confirm that this didn't irritate my scalp at all, moreover, my face as it came in contact with it.

reviews.review_text: Function of beauty pro gifted me this product in exchange for my honest review! I had never tried anything like this before where you mix anti frizz into the shampoo. It really helped tame my frizz and help hydrate my curly 3b/3a hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted! I'm thrilled to share my experience with this remarkable anti-frizz product! Dealing with tangled curls has always been a struggle for me, but this product has completely transformed my routine. Since incorporating it into my haircare regimen, I've noticed a significant reduction in tangles and knots. Not only does it effectively combat frizz, but it also seems to create a protective barrier that prevents my curls from tangling throughout the day. This means less time spent wrestling with my hair and more time enjoying its natural beauty. I appreciate how lightweight the product is, as it doesn't weigh down my curls or leave any greasy residue. Instead, my hair feels soft, smooth, and incredibly manageable. If you're tired of battling tangles and want to embrace smooth, frizz-free curls, I can't recommend this product enough u2013 it's a true game-changer!

If you're on the hunt for a way to tackle frizz and keep your hair humidity-resistant, this might just be your golden ticket. What I love most about this concentrate is that can be easily mixed it, tailoring your  to suit your unique needs. It's been a lifesaver for my slightly curly and I can't recommend it enough. So if you're looking to enhance your routine or incorporate an extra touch of self-care this is the product!

I notice the biggest difference when I decide to air dry or when I diffuse, I normally have frizz around my waves. However this reduces it significantly, and I even notice throughout the day that it doesnu2019t get frizzy; even if the humidity. So this is the only thing I can attribute it to! I was gifted by function of beauty pro.
